app_name: FPS Strike Ops : Modern Arena for Android - Free App Download
about_section: FPS Strike Ops : Modern Arena is an adventure game developed by FPS Shooter & Action Game. The APK has been available since May 2024 . In the last 30 days, the app was downloaded about 7.5 million times. It's top ranked. It's rated 4.55 out of 5 stars, based on 79 thousand ratings. The last update of the app was on April 9, 2025 . FPS Strike Ops : Modern Arena has a content rating "Medium Maturity" . FPS Strike Ops : Modern Arena has an APK download size of 173.92 MB and the latest version available is 1.2.0 . Designed for Android version 6.0+ . FPS Strike Ops : Modern Arena is FREE to download.
app_description:
If you like play Multiplayer (MP)  PvP Offline Shooter and to be a sniper. Here is for you, the latest of Team Deathmatch shooting game ! The combat is real, and you can be the hero. 
🔫Ready. Aim. Fire! 
 This is the #1 realistic 3D team PvP game available on Google Play. You are a well trained elite member of special weapons and tactics teams. Equipped with sub-machine guns, sniper rifles and stun grenades, you will navigate secret missions across the globe to eradicate the evil syndicate that stands in the way of a peaceful world. It is time to load out your firearms! Leave no squad mate behind in this action oriented first person shooter game! Let the bullets fly now! 
===Game Features===
★ Lots of perfect maps to get Best FPS Shooting Experience Ever.
★ 20+ Weapons, Customize Your Exclusive Weapons and Skins! 
(MAC10,TMP,MP5,UMP, P90, Galil, FAMAS, AK47, M4A1,SG-552, AUG,M249-SAW,SG-550,AWP... )
★Customize your weapon and get a unique skins to be cool Multiplayer FPS player.
★Detailed Snipers for shooters who like to be a sniper.
★Death Match: It's kill or be killed, is the way of the gun!.
★Team Death Match: Team vs Team fight, who will be the last team standing on the arena?
★Completely offline that you can play everywhere and any time
★Perfect optimization even for weak devices!
Are you ready?
 Test out your shooting skills in this exciting fast-paced shooting game! Experience action, where fast reflexes and TACTICAL skills are essential to success. Be the best shooter in every beautifully crafted maps!
SUPPORT
We're grateful for any and all feedback and suggestions on the project.😊😊
Recent changes:
- Added 6 new weapons: MP9, Bizon, Galilar, M200, M79, Gatlin.
- Updated some weapon effects.
- Fixed some known bugs.
Don't forget give 5 star to encourage us, more update on the way!
